; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains the quantum yield of the product HCOOH of an experiment or molecular process. The qantum yield of a photochemical process is defined as the amount of reactant consumed or product formed over the number of photons absorbed.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Number]].

; Values
* Input fields should be restricted to positive numbers (<nowiki>regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/</nowiki>).

; Unit
* [[Unit::-to be set-]]
